GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
arm64: ftrace: consistently handle PLTs.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit dcecc96ed16f73417de5550f384e348c9d56f279, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 3b23e4991fb66f6d152f9055ede271a726ef9f21. For more details please see the references link.
